name: Shoot Bow Challenge 18
description:
Shoot Bow Challenge 18!!!
Target shooting range archery with beautiful graphics and realistic simulation of the scene shows lovers of archery most realistic experience. ome to challenge the hundreds of checkpoints obstacles, which also includes a variety of bonus levels! Calm down, relax, take a deep breath and direct the arrow to shoot the bull's eye.
Features:
- Beautiful scene
- Easy and accurate control of archery
- Easy and intuitive control
- In order to get an estimate, you need to shoot well
- Difficult but very addictive
